# Teaching Experience {data-icon=chalkboard-teacher}

```{r list-teaching}
cv_data %>% 
    filter(section == "teaching") %>% 
    arrange(desc(start)) %>% 
    mutate(
        start = lubridate::year(start),
        end = lubridate::year(end),
        end = if_else(is.na(end), "present", as.character(end)),
        organization = organization %>% 
            str_replace_all("\\[(.+?)\\]\\(.+?\\)", "\\1")
    ) %>% 
    vitae::detailed_entries(
        what = glue("{str_to_sentence(role)} for {title}"),
        when = glue("{start}-{end}"),
        with = organization,
        where = location
    ) 

# ### {what}
# {with}
# {when}
# {where}
```
